Class ArrowDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
              • view.ArrowDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable

    public class ArrowDisplay
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas

    ArrowDisplay

    A custom widget for arrows in program. Arrows are enable when from character position in maze, up and down moves are possible.

    Author:
    Valentina Munoz & Moris Amon

      • changeArrowImg

        public void changeArrowImg()

        drawArrow

        Change arrow position to be at the center. Also, if arrow should be disable, change image.

        Parameters:
        width - arrow image width
        height - arrow image height
